column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Chit Sang says : " Hey !
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " I think you mean whom I 'm shoving !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I need backup over here !
#Text=" Male guard says : " No firebending !
#Text=Into the cooler !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I can take you back to your cell if you 've learned your lesson .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yes , I have ... completely .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I got Suki and Chit Sang out of their cells a few minutes ago .
#Text=They 'll be waiting for us at the shore .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Someone 's coming !
#Text=" Male guard says : " Yeah , new arrivals coming in at dawn .
#Text=" Female guard says : " Anybody interesting ?
#Text=" Male guard says : " Nah , just the usual .
#Text=Some robbers , a couple traitors , some war prisoners , though I did hear there might be a pirate .
#Text=" Female guard says : " No fooling !
#Text=" Zuko says : " War prisoners .
#Text=It could be your father .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I know .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , what should we do ?
#Text=Are we going ahead with the plan or are we waiting another night ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do n't know !
#Text=Is it right for me to risk Suki 's freedom , all of our freedom on the slim chance that my dad is gon na show up ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " It 's your call , Sokka .
#Text="
